metadata.dcterms:title: ANHA4-ELG022 (ICB_tracer)
metadata.dcterms:creator: Laura C. Gillard
metadata.dcterms:description:
NEMO version: 3.6
LIM version: 2
Atmospheric Forcing: CGRF
Runoff: Interannual Monthly with Greenland Melt
Open Boundary Condition: GLORYS2v3
Initial Condition: GLORYS2v3
Output frequency: 5 days
Others: Bamber et al. (2018) for Greenland runoff with icebergs; vertical mixing enhanced for runoff from 0 - 30 m; bergy bits set to 0.3; latent heat flux from icebergs included; vertically-integrated ocean forcing of icebergs (Merino et al., 2016); iceberg field initialized in equilibrium (used previous 2015 outputs as "initial condition").
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
ANHA4 v3.6
